评论详情: Best shoes ever, These shoes are incredibly comfortable for my 3-year-old. All kids should use this kind of shoes. I give them a 10/10! Good quality, easy to put on, has slip resistance and is stunning.

类型: Size: 7 Wide ToddlerColor: W8k9 | Grey Gum
评论详情: I probably bought and returned at least 6 pairs of shoes before finding one that fit my 19 month old son’s feet right! He has super wide feet and a wide toe splay, but his instep isn’t that high. New Balance was either too wide at the opening or too narrow at the toe (or both) and stride rite was sold out in all the XW styles I liked. These fit so well, have great slip resistance, are flexible, and seem like good quality. My son never tries to take them off and wears them all day at daycare with no problems. I’m so happy!
